summary: Revolves around three friends who have dream weddings only to find out that the pastor who married them failed to complete the key paperwork required to make them official.
cast: Danielle Panabaker|Jessica Parker Kennedy|Britt Irvin|Ryan Kennedy|Travis Milne|Steve Bacic|Christie Laing|Naomi Judd|Charles Siegel|Jared Keeso|Chris Gauthier|Kenneth W. Yanko|Kathleen Duborg|Kathryn Kirkpatrick|John Tierney|France Perras|Babak A. Motamed|Enid-Raye Adams|Carolyn Adair
